abstract: “Breaking Bad,” which just ended its fourth season on Sunday, had its premiere on Jan. 20, 2008. It started with a straightforward premise: A mild-mannered chemistry teacher named Walter White finds out he has cancer, and so he decides, in order to build up a fortune to leave to his family, to start cooking meth.

headline.main: The Incredible Good Luck of 'Breaking Bad'
